amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds by the intelligence community from subverting or interfering with the integrity of any cryptographic standard that is proposed, developed, or adopted by NIST.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to "consult", as the term is used in reference to the Department of Defense and the National Security Agency, in contravention of the assurance provided in section 20(c)(1)(A) of the National Institute of Standards and Technology Act (15 U.S.C. 278g-3(c)(1)(A).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A064) Agreed to by voice vote.
